dataSource: Jina AI research from competitor websites, freelance platforms, and MT4/MT5 development marketplaces

services.name: MT4 Expert Advisor Development
services.shortDescription: Transform your trading strategy into a fully automated MT4 Expert Advisor. Custom-built EAs with precise entry/exit logic, risk management, and optimized performance for MetaTrader 4 platform.
services.longDescription: Turn your manual trading strategy into a powerful automated system with our professional MT4 Expert Advisor development service. Our experienced MQL4 developers create custom EAs tailored to your exact specifications, incorporating your trading rules, indicators, and risk parameters. Whether you're a scalper, swing trader, or position trader, we build robust, backtested Expert Advisors that execute trades 24/7 with precision. Each EA includes comprehensive risk management, customizable settings, detailed documentation, and ongoing support. We specialize in complex multi-timeframe strategies, indicator-based systems, price action EAs, grid and hedging strategies, and news trading bots. All code is clean, optimized, and fully commented for easy modification. With over 15 years of combined experience in forex trading and MQL4 programming, we deliver production-ready EAs that perform reliably in live market conditions.
features: Advanced risk management (SL, TP, trailing stops, breakeven)
Indicator integration (RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, custom indicators)
Clean, commented code for easy modifications
benefits: 24/7 automated trading without manual intervention
Eliminate emotional trading decisions
Execute trades at optimal speed and precision
Backtest years of historical data in minutes
Consistent application of your trading rules

process.title: Strategy Consultation
process.description: We discuss your trading strategy, rules, indicators, and risk parameters in detail to understand your exact requirements.

process.title: Development & Coding
process.description: Our MQL4 developers build your EA with clean, optimized code following best practices and your specifications.

process.title: Backtesting & Optimization
process.description: We rigorously backtest your EA on historical data, optimize parameters, and fine-tune performance.

process.title: Testing & Delivery
process.description: You receive the EA file (.ex4), source code (.mq4), installation guide, and user manual with full documentation.

process.title: Support & Refinement
process.description: We provide 30 days of free support and minor adjustments to ensure your EA performs as expected.

priceRange.note: Pricing depends on complexity, number of indicators, and custom features required

faq.question: Will I get the source code (.mq4) for my EA?
faq.answer: Yes, you receive both the compiled EA file (.ex4) and the full source code (.mq4) so you can modify it in the future.

faq.question: How long does MT4 EA development take?
faq.answer: Most custom EAs are completed within 2-4 weeks depending on complexity. Simple strategies may be ready in 1-2 weeks, while advanced multi-indicator systems may take 4-6 weeks.

faq.question: Can you convert my TradingView Pine Script strategy to MT4?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We specialize in Pine Script to MQL4 conversion. This is a popular service - see our dedicated Pine Script conversion service for more details.

faq.question: Do you provide backtesting results?
faq.answer: Yes, we include backtesting on at least 3 years of historical data with optimization reports showing performance metrics like profit factor, drawdown, and win rate.

faq.question: What if the EA doesn't work as expected?
faq.answer: We provide 30 days of free support and minor adjustments. We'll work with you until the EA performs according to your specifications.

targetAudience: Forex traders with proven manual strategies
System traders needing custom indicators and logic
Prop firm traders requiring consistent execution

services.name: MT5 Expert Advisor Development
services.shortDescription: Professional MT5 Expert Advisor development with advanced MQL5 features. Build sophisticated trading robots with object-oriented programming, multi-asset support, and enhanced backtesting capabilities.
services.longDescription: Leverage the power of MetaTrader 5 with our professional MT5 Expert Advisor development service. MQL5 offers significant advantages over MQL4 including object-oriented programming, faster execution, more sophisticated testing capabilities, and support for stocks, futures, and options alongside forex. Our MQL5 developers create high-performance EAs that utilize MT5's advanced features including economic calendar integration, depth of market data, multi-threading, and enhanced order management. Perfect for traders migrating from MT4 or those starting fresh on MT5, we build scalable, maintainable EAs with modern coding practices. Whether you need a simple single-strategy EA or a complex multi-strategy portfolio manager, we deliver production-ready solutions backed by comprehensive testing and documentation.
features: Custom classes and libraries for reusability
Economic calendar integration for news trading
Strategy tester agent support for distributed testing
benefits: Superior execution speed compared to MT4
Access to more sophisticated market analysis tools
Better position management and hedging capabilities
More accurate backtesting with real ticks
Future-proof platform with ongoing MetaQuotes support

process.title: Requirements Analysis
process.description: Detailed consultation to understand your strategy, preferred assets, MT5 features needed, and performance goals.

process.title: Architecture Design
process.description: We design the EA structure using OOP principles, create UML diagrams, and plan class hierarchies for optimal performance.

process.title: MQL5 Development
process.description: Professional coding with modern MQL5 syntax, custom classes, error handling, and MT5-specific optimizations.

process.title: Advanced Testing
process.description: Comprehensive testing using MT5 Strategy Tester with real ticks, genetic optimization, and forward testing.

process.title: Delivery & Training
process.description: Complete package with EA files, source code, documentation, and training on MT5-specific features and settings.

priceRange.note: MT5 development typically costs 20-30% more than MT4 due to advanced features and complexity

faq.question: What are the advantages of MT5 over MT4 for EAs?
faq.answer: MT5 offers faster execution, more accurate backtesting with real ticks, support for multiple asset classes, better order management, economic calendar integration, and modern object-oriented programming capabilities.

faq.question: Can you upgrade my existing MT4 EA to MT5?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer MT4 to MT5 migration services. Most EAs can be upgraded to take advantage of MT5's enhanced features and performance improvements.

faq.question: Does MT5 EA development cost more than MT4?
faq.answer: Generally yes, by about 20-30%, because MQL5 requires more advanced programming skills and offers more sophisticated features that take time to implement properly.

faq.question: Can I use the same EA on MT4 and MT5?
faq.answer: No, MT4 and MT5 use different programming languages (MQL4 vs MQL5) and are not compatible. However, we can develop parallel versions for both platforms.

faq.question: How accurate is MT5 backtesting compared to MT4?
faq.answer: MT5 backtesting is significantly more accurate because it can use real tick data with every tick mode, providing near-perfect simulation of live trading conditions.

targetAudience: Traders migrating from MT4 to MT5

services.name: TradingView Pine Script to MT4/MT5 Conversion
services.shortDescription: Convert your profitable TradingView Pine Script strategies to fully functional MT4/MT5 Expert Advisors. Seamless migration from TradingView to MetaTrader platforms with 98%+ accuracy.
services.longDescription: Found a winning strategy on TradingView but want to automate it on MetaTrader? Our Pine Script to MQL4/MQL5 conversion service bridges the gap between these powerful platforms. We manually analyze and convert your Pine Script indicators and strategies into fully functional MetaTrader Expert Advisors, preserving all logic, signals, and visual elements. Unlike automated converters that often produce buggy or inaccurate code, our experienced developers ensure 98%+ accuracy by understanding both Pine Script and MQL syntax deeply. We handle all Pine Script versions (v3, v4, v5, v6), complex multi-timeframe logic, custom functions, and TradingView-specific features. The result is a professional MT4/MT5 EA that replicates your TradingView strategy perfectly, complete with proper risk management, order handling, and alert notifications. Perfect for traders who have tested strategies on TradingView and want to trade them automatically on MT4/MT5 brokers.

faq.question: How accurate is the Pine Script to MQL conversion?
faq.answer: We guarantee 98%+ signal accuracy through manual conversion and comprehensive testing. Unlike automated tools that often fail, we ensure your MT4/MT5 EA produces the same signals as your TradingView strategy.

faq.question: Can you convert any Pine Script version?
faq.answer: Yes, we support all Pine Script versions: v3, v4, v5, and the latest v6. We're experienced with TradingView's evolving syntax and best practices.

faq.question: Do I get the strategy working exactly like on TradingView?
faq.answer: Yes! We replicate all entry/exit signals, indicator calculations, alerts, and logic. The EA will perform identically to your TradingView strategy.

faq.question: Can I convert to both MT4 and MT5?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We offer dual conversion at a discounted rate. This gives you maximum flexibility to use your strategy on either platform.

faq.question: What if my Pine Script uses premium TradingView indicators?
faq.answer: If you have access to the Pine Script code for all indicators, we can convert them. For proprietary indicators you don't have code for, we can create MQL equivalents with similar logic.

Pine Script developers expanding to MetaTrader

services.name: EA Strategy Backtesting & Optimization
services.shortDescription: Professional backtesting and optimization services for your trading strategies and Expert Advisors. Comprehensive historical testing, parameter optimization, and performance analysis with detailed reports.
services.longDescription: Before risking real capital, validate your trading strategy with our professional backtesting and optimization service. We conduct rigorous historical testing using years of high-quality tick data to evaluate your EA's performance under various market conditions. Our optimization process identifies the best parameter combinations for maximum profitability while minimizing drawdown and risk. We test across multiple symbols, timeframes, and market regimes (trending, ranging, high volatility) to ensure robustness. You receive detailed reports including profit factor, Sharpe ratio, win rate, maximum drawdown, recovery factor, and equity curves. We also perform walk-forward analysis, Monte Carlo simulations, and stress testing to validate your strategy's edge. Perfect for traders who want confidence in their EA before going live or need to fine-tune existing systems for better performance.
features: Backtesting on 5-10 years of historical data
Genetic algorithm optimization for parameter tuning
Monte Carlo simulation for risk assessment
Performance metrics: profit factor, Sharpe ratio, drawdown
Visual equity curves and trade distribution charts
benefits: Validate your strategy before risking real money
Identify optimal parameter settings for maximum profit
Understand your EA's behavior in different market conditions
Detect over-optimization and curve-fitting issues
Build confidence with statistical performance data

process.title: Strategy Review
process.description: We analyze your EA or strategy, understand the trading logic, and determine testing parameters and symbols.

process.title: Historical Data Preparation
process.description: We prepare high-quality historical data for your selected symbols and timeframes, ensuring accuracy and completeness.

process.title: Backtesting Execution
process.description: Run comprehensive backtests across multiple years, market conditions, and symbols to evaluate performance.

process.title: Optimization & Analysis
process.description: Use genetic algorithms and walk-forward analysis to find optimal parameters and validate robustness.

process.title: Detailed Reporting
process.description: Receive a comprehensive PDF report with all metrics, charts, trade logs, and recommendations for improvement.

priceRange.note: Pricing depends on number of symbols, optimization complexity, and depth of analysis required

faq.question: How many years of historical data do you test?
faq.answer: We typically backtest 5-10 years of historical data to ensure your strategy works across different market conditions, economic cycles, and volatility regimes.

faq.question: What's the difference between backtesting and optimization?
faq.answer: Backtesting evaluates performance with fixed parameters. Optimization systematically tests thousands of parameter combinations to find the best settings for maximum profitability.

faq.question: How do you prevent over-optimization?
faq.answer: We use walk-forward analysis, out-of-sample testing, and Monte Carlo simulations to ensure parameters work on unseen data, not just the optimization period.

faq.question: Can you backtest strategies that aren't coded yet?
faq.answer: Yes! If you have clear trading rules, we can code a basic EA for backtesting purposes, then provide results and recommendations before full development.

faq.question: What quality of data do you use for backtesting?
faq.answer: We use high-quality tick data from reputable providers. For MT5, we use real tick data. For MT4, we use the highest quality M1 data available with precise modeling.

targetAudience: Traders with manual strategies seeking validation

services.name: EA Modification & Enhancement
services.shortDescription: Upgrade and improve your existing Expert Advisors with new features, bug fixes, and performance enhancements. Add indicators, improve risk management, or modernize old EAs.
services.longDescription: Already have an EA but need it improved or updated? Our EA modification and enhancement service breathes new life into existing Expert Advisors. Whether you need bug fixes, new indicators added, improved risk management, or complete modernization of old code, our experienced MQL developers can help. We work with EAs written by others, protected code (when possible), legacy MT4 EAs that need MT5 conversion, and outdated systems requiring modern features. Common enhancements include adding trailing stops, breakeven logic, time filters, news avoidance, partial close functions, multi-timeframe confirmations, dashboard panels, and remote monitoring. We also optimize slow or inefficient code, fix compilation errors in outdated EAs, and add protective features against broker manipulation. Perfect for traders who have EAs that almost work but need that final touch to become truly profitable and reliable.
features: Add new indicators or trading logic
Add time filters and session management

Create custom dashboards and info panels

faq.question: Can you modify an EA if I only have the .ex4 file (no source code)?
faq.answer: In most cases, yes. We can decompile .ex4 files and modify the logic, though this takes longer. However, heavily protected EAs may be impossible to modify without source code.

faq.question: How much does it cost to add features to an existing EA?
faq.answer: Simple additions (like a new indicator or time filter) start at GH₵1,051-GH₵2,102. Complex enhancements (like rebuilding the risk management system) range GH₵3,153-GH₵8,408.

faq.question: My EA stopped working after a MetaTrader update. Can you fix it?
faq.answer: Absolutely! This is a common issue. MT4 and MT5 updates sometimes break old code. We'll modernize the code to work with current MetaTrader builds.

faq.question: Can you make my EA work on MT5 instead of MT4?
faq.answer: Yes! MT4 to MT5 migration is one of our core services. We'll convert the EA to MQL5 while maintaining all functionality and adding MT5-specific improvements.

faq.question: What if I don't know exactly what changes I need?
faq.answer: That's fine! During our consultation, we'll review your EA's current performance and recommend specific improvements to increase profitability and reduce risk.

targetAudience: Users of purchased EAs needing customization
Traders with legacy EAs from years ago

faq.question: Can the indicator scan multiple pairs and timeframes?

faq.question: Will the indicator work on both MT4 and MT5?

faq.question: Can you recreate an indicator I saw somewhere?

services.name: MT4 to MT5 EA Migration
services.shortDescription: Seamlessly migrate your MT4 Expert Advisors to the modern MT5 platform. Professional MQL4 to MQL5 conversion with enhanced features and improved performance.
services.longDescription: Future-proof your trading automation by upgrading MT4 Expert Advisors to MT5. As MetaQuotes focuses development on MT5 and more brokers adopt it as their primary platform, migrating from MT4 to MT5 ensures longevity and access to superior features. Our MT4 to MT5 upgrade service handles complete EA migration, translating MQL4 code to modern MQL5 while preserving all original functionality. We don't just convert syntax—we enhance your EA to leverage MT5's advantages: faster execution speed, more accurate backtesting with real ticks, better order management, economic calendar integration, and multi-asset support. The upgrade process includes refactoring code to use MT5's object-oriented capabilities, implementing proper error handling, adding hedge account support if needed, and optimizing performance for the MT5 environment. Your upgraded EA will be backward-tested to ensure signal accuracy matches the original MT4 version while benefiting from MT5's modern architecture.
features: Complete MQL4 to MQL5 code conversion
Preservation of all original EA functionality
benefits: Access to faster execution and better fills
More accurate backtesting with real ticks
Support for stocks, futures, and options trading
Better position and order management
Future-proof solution as MT5 adoption grows

faq.question: Will my MT4 EA work exactly the same on MT5?
faq.answer: Yes! We ensure 98%+ signal accuracy by thorough testing. However, you may see improved performance due to MT5's better execution and order filling.

faq.question: What's the main difference between MT4 and MT5 for EAs?
faq.answer: MT5 uses MQL5 (object-oriented programming), has better backtesting with real ticks, faster execution, support for more asset classes, and improved order management.

faq.question: Can I keep using my MT4 EA while the MT5 version is being developed?
faq.answer: Absolutely! The migration doesn't affect your existing MT4 EA. You can continue trading with it until the MT5 version is ready and tested.

faq.question: Do I need MT5-specific enhancements or just a basic conversion?
faq.answer: That's up to you! Basic conversion ensures your EA works on MT5. Enhanced conversion adds MT5-specific features like economic calendar integration, multi-threading, or improved order management.

faq.question: Will the MT5 version work with both hedging and netting accounts?
faq.answer: We can configure your EA for either mode or both. MT5 supports both hedging (like MT4) and netting (one position per symbol) account types.

targetAudience: MT4 EA owners wanting MT5 compatibility
Traders whose brokers are switching to MT5

services.name: Multi-Timeframe Trading Systems
services.shortDescription: Sophisticated multi-timeframe Expert Advisors that analyze multiple time periods simultaneously. Build robust trading systems using top-down analysis for higher-probability trades.
services.longDescription: Implement professional top-down trading methodology with our multi-timeframe EA development service. The most profitable traders analyze multiple timeframes before entering trades—higher timeframes for trend direction, lower timeframes for precise entries. Our multi-timeframe systems codify this approach into automated EAs that analyze 2-4 timeframes simultaneously, ensuring all conditions align before opening positions. We build sophisticated MTF EAs that check higher timeframe trend on H4/D1, confirm medium timeframe setup on H1, execute entries on lower timeframe like M15/M5, and manage positions based on multi-timeframe conditions. The result is dramatically improved win rates, fewer false signals, better risk-reward ratios, and more robust performance across market conditions. We specialize in MTF indicator-based systems, price action EAs with MTF confirmation, trend-following strategies with MTF filters, and custom MTF logic unique to your methodology.
benefits: Higher win rate through MTF confirmation
Better trend alignment and fewer counter-trend trades
More robust performance across market conditions
Professional top-down analysis automated
Fewer trades but higher quality setups

process.title: MTF Strategy Design
process.description: Define which timeframes to analyze, what each timeframe confirms, and how conditions must align for trade entry.

process.title: Logic Architecture
process.description: Design the hierarchical decision tree: higher TF trend filter, medium TF setup confirmation, lower TF entry trigger.

process.title: MTF Development
process.description: Build the EA with proper MTF data handling, ensuring accurate cross-timeframe analysis without look-ahead bias.

process.title: Comprehensive Testing
process.description: Test across various timeframe combinations and market conditions to validate MTF logic reduces false signals.

process.title: Optimization & Delivery
process.description: Optimize timeframe combinations and thresholds, deliver EA with MTF configuration guide and best practice recommendations.

priceRange.note: MTF systems require advanced programming and testing, pricing reflects complexity and development time

faq.question: What timeframe combinations work best for MTF systems?
faq.answer: Popular combinations: D1/H4/H1 for swing trading, H4/H1/M15 for day trading, H1/M15/M5 for scalping. The key is maintaining 3-4x ratio between timeframes.

faq.question: Do MTF EAs trade less frequently?
faq.answer: Yes, typically 30-50% fewer trades than single-timeframe EAs, but with significantly higher win rates and better risk-reward due to better filtering.

faq.question: Can I combine different indicators across timeframes?
faq.answer: Absolutely! For example: MA crossover on D1 for trend, RSI divergence on H1 for setup, price action on M15 for entry. This is very effective.

faq.question: How do you prevent look-ahead bias in MTF analysis?
faq.answer: We use proper MQL functions (iCustom, CopyBuffer) with correct shift parameters to ensure MTF data is synchronized and represents what would be known at each bar.

faq.question: Are MTF systems better than single-timeframe EAs?
faq.answer: Generally yes, for discretionary-style trading. MTF systems align with how professional traders think (top-down analysis) and produce higher quality, more consistent results.

targetAudience: Prop traders with strict consistency requirements

services.name: Advanced Risk Management Systems
services.shortDescription: Professional risk management modules for Expert Advisors. Implement sophisticated position sizing, portfolio-level risk controls, drawdown limits, and protective mechanisms.
services.longDescription: Protect your capital with professional-grade risk management integrated into your Expert Advisors. Most trading failures result from poor risk management, not bad strategies. Our advanced risk management development service implements institutional-level controls including dynamic position sizing based on account equity, maximum daily/weekly/monthly loss limits, maximum concurrent trades across symbols, correlation-based position limits, drawdown protection mechanisms, time-based risk reduction, volatility-adjusted position sizing, and emergency stop functionality. We build comprehensive risk frameworks that protect against account blowups, preserve capital during drawdown periods, optimize position sizes for account growth, and maintain consistency across varying market conditions. Perfect for serious traders, prop firm accounts with strict rules, portfolio managers running multiple strategies, and anyone who understands that risk management is the difference between long-term success and eventual failure.
features: Dynamic position sizing (Kelly, fixed fractional, etc.)
benefits: Prevent account blowups with hard limits
Optimize position size for consistent growth
Meet prop firm risk requirements automatically
Protect profits during drawdown periods
Scale position size as account grows

process.description: Develop risk management module as standalone utility or integrate directly into your EA with proper override controls.

process.title: Stress Testing
process.description: Test risk controls under extreme conditions: high volatility, consecutive losses, correlated positions, to ensure protections work.

process.title: Documentation & Training
process.description: Receive detailed documentation explaining all risk parameters, how to configure for different account sizes, and best practices.

priceRange.note: Standalone risk manager GH₵3,153-GH₵6,306, full EA integration with advanced features GH₵6,306-GH₵12,612

faq.question: What's the difference between basic and advanced risk management?
faq.answer: Basic: fixed lot size and stop loss. Advanced: dynamic position sizing, portfolio-level limits, drawdown protection, volatility adjustment, correlation controls.

faq.question: Can you add risk management to my existing EA?
faq.answer: Yes! We can integrate advanced risk management into any EA, whether it was built by us or another developer (source code required).

faq.question: How does dynamic position sizing work?
faq.answer: Position size adjusts based on factors like account equity, recent win/loss streak, current drawdown level, and market volatility. Increases during good times, decreases during drawdown.

faq.question: Can the risk manager work across multiple EAs?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We can build a portfolio-level risk manager that monitors all EAs on an account and enforces global limits like max daily loss or max concurrent trades.

faq.question: Is this necessary for prop firm trading?
faq.answer: Highly recommended! Prop firms have strict rules (max daily loss, max total loss, consistency requirements). Our risk manager ensures automatic compliance with these rules.

targetAudience: Prop firm traders with strict risk rules

services.name: Signal Provider & Copy Trading Systems
services.shortDescription: Build professional signal distribution and trade copying systems. Develop MQL-based solutions for providing signals to subscribers or copying trades across multiple accounts.
services.longDescription: Monetize your trading expertise or scale your strategy across multiple accounts with our signal provider and copy trading system development. We build complete MQL-based solutions for distributing trading signals to subscribers, copying trades from master to slave accounts, managing subscriber portfolios, and creating white-label signal services. Our systems include master account signal generation with quality filtering, subscriber management with individual settings, local and remote copy trading functionality, signal quality scoring and analytics, subscriber dashboard and reporting, payment integration for subscription fees, and risk management per subscriber account. Perfect for successful traders wanting to share signals for monthly fees, prop traders scaling across multiple accounts, fund managers needing trade distribution, and entrepreneurs building signal service businesses. All solutions include subscriber management, performance tracking, and professional branding options.
features: Master account signal generation and filtering
Lot size multipliers and risk adjustments
benefits: Monetize your trading skills with subscription revenue
Scale your strategy across unlimited accounts
Provide professional signal service to clients
Build recurring income from signal subscribers
Maintain control over signal quality and distribution

process.title: System Architecture Planning
process.description: Define signal generation rules, copying method (local vs MT4/MT5 signals), subscriber management needs, and monetization model.

process.title: Master Account Setup
process.description: Develop master account EA that generates signals, applies quality filters, and manages signal distribution to subscribers.

process.title: Copy Logic Development
process.description: Build subscriber-side EAs that receive and execute signals with individual risk management, lot multipliers, and filters.

process.title: Management Dashboard
process.description: Create subscriber management system with performance tracking, billing integration, and analytics for both provider and subscribers.

process.title: Launch & Support
process.description: Complete testing with test subscribers, provide documentation for onboarding, and offer ongoing support for system operation.

priceRange.note: Basic local copier GH₵8,408-GH₵12,612, full signal service with management dashboard GH₵15,765-GH₵31,530

faq.question: What's the difference between local and remote copy trading?
faq.answer: Local: copies trades on same PC/VPS instantly. Remote: uses MT4/MT5 signals service or custom server to copy trades across different locations with slight delay.

faq.question: Can subscribers have different risk settings?
faq.answer: Yes! Each subscriber can have individual lot multipliers, maximum risk per trade, symbols to include/exclude, and trading hours settings.

faq.question: How do I charge subscribers for signals?
faq.answer: We can integrate payment systems (Stripe, PayPal), implement license key verification, or connect to MQL5 signals marketplace depending on your business model.

faq.question: Can I filter which trades get copied to subscribers?
faq.answer: Absolutely! You can implement quality filters: only copy trades with X pips profit, exclude trades during news, filter by win rate, etc.

faq.question: How many subscribers can one master account support?
faq.answer: Hundreds or thousands depending on implementation. Local copying limited by VPS, remote/server-based systems scale to unlimited subscribers.

services.name: Forward Testing & Live Validation
services.shortDescription: Professional forward testing and live validation services for Expert Advisors. Test your EA on live demo accounts with real market conditions and receive detailed performance analysis.
services.longDescription: Backtesting shows what could have happened. Forward testing reveals what actually happens in live market conditions. Our forward testing and live validation service runs your Expert Advisor on monitored demo accounts with real-time spreads, slippage, and execution conditions for 30-90 days before you risk real capital. We handle complete forward testing infrastructure including multiple broker demo accounts, 24/7 VPS monitoring, daily performance tracking, weekly progress reports, comparison of live vs backtest results, and identification of execution issues. You receive comprehensive validation reports showing actual win rate, real slippage impact, broker execution quality, performance across news events, and honest assessment of whether the EA is ready for live trading. This crucial step prevents costly mistakes and builds confidence before going live. Perfect for traders who have backtested EAs and want real-world validation, developers wanting objective third-party testing, and prop traders needing proven track records.
features: 30-90 day forward testing on live demo accounts
Real spread, slippage, and execution conditions
Daily tracking with weekly progress reports
Backtest vs forward test comparison analysis
benefits: Validate EA performs in real market conditions
Identify execution issues before live trading
Build confidence with actual forward test results
Compare multiple brokers objectively
Receive unbiased third-party performance data

process.title: EA Setup & Configuration
process.description: Provide your EA and optimal settings from backtesting. We set up demo accounts on your chosen brokers.

process.title: Forward Testing Launch
process.description: Deploy EA on monitored VPS with multiple demo accounts, begin 24/7 data collection and performance tracking.

process.title: Ongoing Monitoring
process.description: Daily review of trades and performance. Weekly reports sent with current stats, notable trades, and preliminary observations.

process.title: Comparative Analysis
process.description: Compare forward test results with backtesting: win rate, profit factor, drawdown, signal accuracy, execution quality.

process.title: Final Validation Report
process.description: Receive comprehensive PDF report with all statistics, trade logs, broker comparisons, and go-live recommendation.

priceRange.note: 30-day test GH₵2,102-GH₵3,153, 60-day GH₵4,204-GH₵5,255, 90-day comprehensive validation GH₵6,306-GH₵8,408

faq.question: Why is forward testing necessary if I've backtested?
faq.answer: Backtesting uses historical data without real spreads, slippage, or execution delays. Forward testing reveals how the EA actually performs with these real-world factors.

faq.question: How long should forward testing run?
faq.answer: Minimum 30 days to capture various market conditions, ideally 60-90 days to include different volatility regimes and see consistency.

faq.question: Can you test on specific brokers?
faq.answer: Yes! We can set up demo accounts with any broker you specify, or test across multiple brokers to compare execution quality and performance.

faq.question: What if the EA performs poorly during forward testing?
faq.answer: This is valuable information! It means the EA needs optimization or isn't ready for live trading. Better to discover this on demo than real money.

faq.question: Do you provide MyFxBook or FX Blue tracking links?
faq.answer: Yes! We can set up public tracking on MyFxBook, FX Blue, or similar platforms so you can monitor forward testing progress in real-time.

targetAudience: Traders validating new EAs before live trading
Prop traders requiring proven track records
